title: When you see a hot girl wearing a mini-skirt
body:
...and you realized you're Vladimir:

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9TBX5HhF3OI/Vxb6StkroQI/AAAAAAAAN7o/HNUOu7AbRdwBBT28Gl7mhOK2JojikTLIgCKgB/s1600/VladimirQbuff.png

_Literally my first thought when I first saw this new ability icon lol :p_

replies.body:
Vlad be like 
http://imgur.com/vp8jU5X
This was the exact gif I was thinking of...
Well you should have posted it then
I was just unsure if posting it would have been okay. So I opted to play it safe instead.
Still, those 8 upvotes could have been yours!
Oh well.

> [{quoted}](name=Erdamon,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bz3pgfhc,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-24T14:59:46.848+0000)
>
> Still, those 30 upvotes could have been yours!

Ftfy
That just proves my point even further
I think we'll need more than a toothbrush to clean this one up...

{{champion:8}}  vs {{champion:1}}:

http://mybroadband.co.za/news/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/Chris-Hansen-Child-Porn-Catch-a-Predator-meme.jpg

Relevant
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hN4aRUfSRFg

The face Vlad makes when he pools under a female champion wearing a skirt

{{champion:8}} "I can see your underwear from here!"
There's something about a pool of blood under a girl wearing a skirt that disturbs me

> [{quoted}](name=Auryiel,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bz3pgfhc,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-04-24T18:12:43.406+0000)
>
> There's something about a pool of blood under a girl wearing a skirt that disturbs me

Something my friends pointed out to me..
http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Leona_1.jpg

...yup...just...yup.

Sigh, that was my favorite Leona splash too...

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

but then you realize that's not vladimir
http://static.tumblr.com/c7f55a82be273d90dd1ae2a9840f4f94/mbb2wao/xHzmnup1h/tumblr_static_it_was_me_dio.jpg

Dio vs{{champion:75}} 

We all know who wins that one.

seems pretty clear to me
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/deathbattlefanon/images/1/18/ROAD_ROLLER_DA!.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150611035227
Vlad VS Syndra lane in a nutshell.
{{champion:26}}  I knew you would do that

http://i.imgur.com/3rophHx.jpg

When you see Tristana enter a bush all alone...

Hot girl you say?
http://pm1.narvii.com/5926/7bc1e22bc50dcc94e54b775dfaa1d7f93689bec0_hq.jpg

......my mind went instantly to the gutter with this post......
WELL DONE!

+1
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Vlad be like come to my pool
I approve.
There's a wasted opportunity for a joke on the 2.5 seconds that icon is in your buff bar.

I'm suddenly imaging a very specific gif to post... But...

http://www.socialmemegenerator.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/not-sure-if-okay-to-post-certain-gif_f499d958771.png
